attributes.action: intervene in Royal Mail's plans to relocate Oundle Delivery Office to Peterborough.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail want to move Oundle Delivery Office from its current location in Oundle to Orton Southgate, Peterborough. This would cause tremendous inconvenience to over 4,500 residential and business customers. In addition, a valuable local service would be compromised and local jobs would be lost. Please lend your support by signing this petition and STOP THE CLOSURE OF OUNDLE DELIVERY OFFICE. Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
